thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Ghana defender Daniel Opare returns to training at Augsburg after SIX WEEKS out
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Ghana defender Daniel Opare returns to training at Augsburg after SIX WEEKS out

title: EXCLUSIVE: Ghana defender Daniel Opare returns to training at Augsburg after SIX WEEKS out
text:
15:10 CET EXCLUSIVE: Ghana defender Daniel Opare returns to training at Augsburg after SIX WEEKS out - www.ghanasoccernet.com Daniel Opare 
Ghana defender Daniel Opare has returned to training at German Bundesliga side after a six-week injury lay off, Africanfootball.com has exclusively reported. 
The right-back joined the rest of his teammates last Wednesday for the first since picking up an injury on his first work-out with August in mid-August. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
